title: Global basketball shoe sales 2012 - 2013 , by NBA player
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Quarters on X-axis for 2 groups 2012, and 2013. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Over the 5 Quarters, the SOME LABEL for both 2013 and 2012 have declined.
Out of all 2 groups, 2013 had the highest SOME LABEL in Quarter Michael Jordan and 2012 had the lowest SOME LABEL in Quarter Kevin Durant.
In Quarter Michael Jordan, 2013 had the highest SOME LABEL among all 5 Quarters and it has the lowest SOME LABEL in Quarter Derrick Rose.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 5 different Quarters for 2 groups 2012, and 2013 that are presented on the X-axis.
All through the Quarters, similar trend was observed for 2013 and 2012. In both cases, the SOME LABEL have declined.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Quarters on X-axis for 2 groups 2012, and 2013. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Over the 5 Quarters, the SOME LABEL for both 2013 and 2012 have declined.
Out of all 2 groups, 2013 had the highest SOME LABEL in Quarter Michael Jordan and 2012 had the lowest SOME LABEL in Quarter Kevin Durant.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Quarters on X-axis for 2 groups 2012, and 2013. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
All through the Quarters, similar trend was observed for 2013 and 2012. In both cases, the SOME LABEL have declined.
Out of all 2 groups, 2013 had the highest SOME LABEL in Quarter Michael Jordan and 2012 had the lowest SOME LABEL in Quarter Kevin Durant.
Among all the Quarters, 2013 had the highest SOME LABEL 2500.0 in Quarter Michael Jordan and lowest value 40.0 in Quarter Derrick Rose.
Quarter Michael Jordan and Derrick Rose had the biggest gap of 2460.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for 2013.
Among all 2 groups, 2012 had the gap of 1965.0 between the maximum and minimum SOME LABEL observed in Quarter Michael Jordan and Kevin Durant respectively.
Averaging all 2 groups 2012, and 2013, the Quarter Michael Jordan is the maximum SOME LABEL and Derrick Rose is the minimum SOME LABEL.
